title: John Muir National Historic Site: History & Culture
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture             History & Culture       Learn More About John Muir  Learn about John Muir and the people surrounding him: his family, colleagues, friends, and the ranch workers. Learn about where John Muir lived and worked through the places associated with John Muir NHS. Learn about the museum and archives collection of John Muir National Historic Site and how to research the collections and donate artifacts and archives to the park..  Â    People Learn about John Muir and the people surrounding him: his family, colleagues, friends, and the ranch workers. Places Learn about where John Muir lived and worked through the places associated with John Muir NHS. Museum and Archives Collections Learn about the museum and archives collections, how to research the collections, and donate artifacts and archives to the park.
